Detailed Description

the Wilson Gauge Action

Example: 

///    int ns=2, steps=10;
///    gauge_field U(lattice,nc);
///    coefficients gauge;
///    U.load("myfield.0000");
///    gauge["beta"]=6.0;
///    ImprovedGaugeAction::heatbath(U,gauge,steps);
///    U.save("myfield.0001");
///
